headline: Micron stock falls amid semiconductor weakness and analyst downgrade
summary: Investing.com -- Micron Technology (NASDAQ:MU) stock closed 3% lower on Tuesday as semiconductor stocks weakened due to ongoing trade tensions with China and following an analyst downgrade.
